Package com.aventura.math.transform

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Homothety
    This class is a transformation that represents an homothety having its center at origin O.
    Repere

    Transformation
    This class intends to represent a complete transformation for a 3D element (either simple or complex/agglomerated).
    Translation
    This class is a transformation that represents a translation The translation is formalized by a vector.
